column2: A Society of Northern Water Tribe women who practice and teach the art of healing.
Your time here has made you a master bender.

After Hours of meditation you stare into the pool and see the two fish swimming in perfect balance. Push and Pull. Life and Death. Tui and La. You understand...Chi...It's the lifeforce that rules everything. You can control chi and heal people.
You can control chi and heal people.
It seems [FromFrom.GetFullName] has taken a special interest in the study of Chi Paths and Healing, personally attending your practices to get pointers.
Overall, you feel they have learned a great deal from this.
You've taken the opportunity to get healing lessons from [From.GetFullName], just between the two of you, and you are happy with the results. You've made noticeable progress.
